publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-72 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerkâ€”That the Parliament agrees that between 1 June 2003 and 27 August 2004 the office of the Clerk shall be open all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 28 November 2003, 24 December (pm), 25 December and 26 December 2003, 1 and 2 January 2004, 9 and 12 April 2004, 3 May, 28 May and 31 May 2004. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
